Who This Is For

Investment Banking Candidates

Targeting analyst or associate roles at bulge brackets, elite boutiques, or middle-market banks

Transitioning from consulting, Big 4, or other industries into finance

Non-Target Students

Competing against target school candidates with a stronger resume

MBA Candidates

Pre-MBA or post-MBA positioning for associate-level recruiting

What We Review

Every resume review includes detailed feedback on:

Format and structure compliance with industry standards
Bullet point strength and quantification
Experience positioning and narrative flow
GPA and education presentation
Skills and interests section optimization
Deal/transaction descriptions (if applicable)
Typos, formatting inconsistencies, and red flags
Overall competitiveness for target roles

Before & After Examples

See the kind of transformations our feedback enables.

Before

Responsible for financial analysis and modeling

After

Built 3-statement financial model for $75M revenue SaaS company, identifying 20% cost reduction opportunity

Vague responsibility → Specific achievement with numbers

Before

Helped with pitch book creation

After

Developed 30-page management presentation for $150M sell-side M&A process, supporting successful transaction close

'Helped' is weak → Active verb with deal context

Before

Worked on due diligence projects

After

Led financial due diligence workstream for 3 acquisitions totaling $200M, analyzing revenue quality and working capital trends

No specifics → Quantified scope and responsibilities

Frequently Asked Questions

Who reviews my resume?

Your resume is reviewed by professionals with direct finance recruiting experience—people who have screened resumes, conducted interviews, and made hiring decisions at top firms.

How long does it take?

Resume Review is delivered within 3-5 business days. Resume Rewrite takes 5-7 business days. Need it faster? Contact us about rush options.

What if I'm not satisfied?

We offer a 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the quality of feedback, we'll refund your payment in full.

Can you review resumes for specific firms?

Yes. When you submit, you can specify target firms and we'll tailor feedback to what those specific banks/funds look for.

Do you work with international candidates?

Absolutely. We work with candidates targeting US, UK, and other global finance roles. Resume conventions vary by region and we adjust accordingly.

What's the difference between Review and Rewrite?

Review gives you detailed feedback and suggestions—you make the changes. Rewrite means we completely reconstruct your resume for you, delivering a polished final document.
